title: Wowwww
content: Now reduced to a schoolyard chant, the Hope family murders shocked the Maine coast one bloody night in 1929. While most people assume seventeen-year-old Lenora was responsible, the police were never able to prove it. Other than her denial after the killings, she has never spoken publicly about that night, nor has she set foot outside Hope‚Äôs End, the cliffside mansion where the massacre occurred.

title: Verified Purchase
content: THE ONLY ONE LEFT, by Riley Sager started out strong, with the premise of a caregiver going to nurse an elderly woman--now partially paralyzed by strokes, and incapable of speech--who was thought to have killed her family in 1929. Although the woman was found innocent from lack of evidence, she was the only one left, and opinions remained firm that she committed the murders.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2024

title: Great read !
content: The gothic atmosphere of the decaying mansion on an unstable cliffside were phenomenal. I loved the touches such as slanting floors, and cracks appearing in the walls from the movement of the water and land below. The pacing was good--shorter chapters that propelled me into wanting to read the next immediately. I did figure out one key twist earlier than I would have liked, but in the scheme of the book, it was only one of many, and on its own did not detract from my wanting to know more.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Where the book fell for me was mainly at the end. I felt that too much (and too many coincidences) were added in practically at the last moment. In this case, "less would have been more", in my opinion. Despite not really "liking" any of the characters, I was quite invested in what had happened to the family in the past. Things were progressing well until close to the last quarter or so, when some of the lines merging seemed too thin to be believable. If not for that, I believe this would have easily been a 4.5 star read for me.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I loved the setting: old mansion on a crumbling cliff; 80‚Äôs time frame. The characters: old Mrs. Baker, devoted house manager, Archie, devoted chef, Jessica, new young maid, Carter, new and young groundskeeper. Kit is the main character and she is kind of a sad, struggling 30‚Äôs year old. Her mother recently passed from cancer and Kit was her carer. Now her dad won‚Äôt really talk to her and blames Kit for her mothers death in a sense. Kit takes the role of Lenora‚Äôs carer for money to get away from that town and also to prove to herself she is good at her job.
